name: 迈克尔·福克斯
name_full: 迈克尔·福克斯 Michael Fox
introduction: Overview (1)Birth Name	Michael C. FoxMini Bio (1)Michael Fox was born as Michael C. Fox. He is an actor, known for Dunkirk (2017), Downton Abbey (2010) and Downton Abbey (2019).Trivia (4)He has two horses named George and Norfolk. [2015].He almost chose to join the mounted police instead of pursuing a career in acting.He was rejected from drama school twice before securing a place at London's Central School of Speech and Drama. He landed the role on Downton Abbey 20 months after graduating.He is also a musician and is in a band called Luna.Personal Quotes (2)It's hard to balance as it's a full-on sport - you can't really do it in half measures. I do it every now and again and compete when I'm not working. Britisch eventing - dressage, showjumping and cross country. I'm nowhere near good enough for Team GB, though. It's so hard to be successful in that sport.I love horses. I wanted to be a vet, but I was nowhere near academic enough. Then I wanted to go into the mounted police or the Household Cavalry. I've got two horses back home called George and Norfolk.
